title: Noname API Security Solution for Microsoft Sentinel
descriptionMarkdown: Noname Security REST API connection to push data into Azure Sentinel via the Azure Monitor API

sampleQueries.description: One-line title for your sample query 1

dataTypes.name: DATATYPE_NAME
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
DATATYPE_NAME
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
DATATYPE_NAME
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)
